Package Fractales.fractals

Class Fractal

java.lang.Object
Fractales.fractals.Fractal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Julia, Mandelbrot
public abstract class Fractal extends Object
The abstract class representing a Fractal. It has two constructors, one for calculating it with a step-between-pixels, and one with an image size.

  • Constructor Details

    • Fractal

      public Fractal(ComplexRectangle rect, double step, int max, int r)
      Parameters:
      rect - The complex rectangle the fractal is drawn in
      step - The step to add between each complex point for each pixel (image size is automatically calculated)
      max - The maximum number of iterations before a point becomes fully divergent.
      r - The radius

    • Fractal

      public Fractal(ComplexRectangle rect, int screenSize, int max, int r)
      Parameters:
      rect - The complex rectangle the fractal is drawn in
      screenSize - The size in pixel the fractal is represented in (the step is automatically calculated)
      max - The maximum number of iterations before a point becomes fully divergent.
      r - The radius

      public abstract int escapeOrbit(org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Complex z)
      Calculates the number of iterations before a specific point of the fractal escapes the orbit

    • zoomed

      public abstract <T extends Fractal> T zoomed(double factor)
      Returns a version of the Fractal zoomed by the provided factor
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of fractal
      Parameters:
      factor - The zoom factor (1 is no change, < 1 zooms in, > 1 zooms out)
      Returns:
      The new zoomed fractal

    • translated

      public abstract <T extends Fractal> T translated(ComplexRectangle.TranslationDirection direction)
      Returns a version of the Fractal who's complex rectangle was translated in the provided direction
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of fractal
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to shift the complex rectangle to
      Returns:
      The new translated fractal
